snippet: Two red-haired girls on the Dublin docks, at the end of an Irish boom.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Rosemary Mahoney describes meeting two poor, young Irish girls in an upscale neighborhood in Dublin before the economic collapse in 2008; expresses admiration for their verve, tenacity, independence and savvy imagination on the occasion of St Parick's Day, noting they were probably not terribly affected by the vagaries of the Irish economy.
lead_paragraph: Two red-haired girls on the Dublin docks, at the end of an Irish boom.

headline.main: The Story of Bridie and Mo
headline.print_headline: The Story of Bridie and Mo
